attributes.action: give a tougher sentence to those who break their restraining order, by means of jail or tagging!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These people who disobey their orders should be given a tougher sentence because of their own liability to have been given a restraining order in the first place! There are people living in fear and people dying because of the current restraining order system. If tougher measures can be made for repeat offences like jail as an option, then it can only mean no further harassment to the victims and families!
